# @doderasoftware/vue-stepper

> A headless, accessible, and fully customizable multi-step stepper component for Vue 3

## Package Information

- **npm**: https://www.npmjs.com/package/@doderasoftware/vue-stepper
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/Dodera-Software/vue-stepper
- **Documentation**: https://vue-stepper.doderasoft.com/
- **Version**: 1.0.1
- **License**: MIT
- **Author**: Dodera Software SRL (https://doderasoft.com)

## Installation

```bash
npm install @doderasoftware/vue-stepper
```

## Quick Start

```vue
<template>
  <Stepper
    v-model="currentStep"
    :steps="steps"
    :can-go-next="canProceed"
    @complete="handleComplete"
  >
    <template #default="{ currentStep }">
      <!-- Your step content here -->
    </template>
  </Stepper>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { ref } from 'vue'
import { Stepper } from '@doderasoftware/vue-stepper'
import type { StepConfig } from '@doderasoftware/vue-stepper'

const currentStep = ref(0)
const steps: StepConfig[] = [
  { category: 'Step 1', title: 'Personal Info' },
  { category: 'Step 2', title: 'Account Details', optional: true },
  { category: 'Step 3', title: 'Review' },
]
</script>
```

## Features

- ✅ Vue 3 Composition API with TypeScript
- ✅ Responsive sidebar that collapses on mobile
- ✅ Step locking and validation support
- ✅ Optional steps with visual indicators
- ✅ Progress tracking with visual progress bar
- ✅ Full UI customization via :ui prop (50+ customizable keys)
- ✅ Accessible and keyboard navigable
- ✅ Zero external dependencies (except Vue)

## Exports

### Components
- `Stepper` - Main stepper component
- `StepperMobileHeader` - Mobile header component (internal)
- `OptionalStepNotice` - Optional step notice component (internal)

### Composables
- `useMultiStep` - Headless composable for custom implementations

### Types
- `StepConfig` - Step configuration interface
- `StepChangeEvent` - Step change event payload
- `StepperUI` - UI customization interface for Stepper
- `MobileHeaderUI` - UI customization interface for mobile header
- `OptionalNoticeUI` - UI customization interface for optional notice

## Props

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| modelValue | number | 0 | Current step index (v-model) |
| steps | StepConfig[] | required | Array of step configurations |
| sidebarTitle | string | '' | Title above sidebar steps |
| canGoNext | boolean | true | Whether user can proceed |
| nextButtonText | string | 'Continue' | Next button text |
| completeButtonText | string | 'Complete' | Complete button text |
| showNavigation | boolean | true | Show/hide navigation buttons |
| ui | StepperUI | {} | Override default classes |
| mobileHeaderUI | MobileHeaderUI | {} | Override mobile header classes |
| optionalNoticeUI | OptionalNoticeUI | {} | Override notice classes |

## Events

| Event | Payload | Description |
|-------|---------|-------------|
| update:modelValue | number | Step index changed |
| complete | void | Last step completed |

## Requirements

- Vue 3.5+
- Tailwind CSS (optional, for default styling)
